content:
This is my site about me.
=========
I probably gave you a card with a custom id.
-------------
Just type it on the end of the url to begin.

For example, if your card says 8888 then type [http://www.dannawara.com/8888](http://www.dannawara.com/8888).

Otherwise here's a bunch of random stuff about me.

So glad you decided to drop by.
=========

You probably took this card so you can learn more about stuff I do.

Well, I've selected a couple of keen things you might be interested here, but you can always browse everything by visiting the [home page](/)

Take a look at the stuff below and let me know what you think. And feel free to contact me.
